query:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%EU AI Act%' OR questionText LIKE '%high-risk%' OR questionText LIKE '%Article%' THEN 'EU AI Act'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%NIST%' OR questionText LIKE '%risk management framework%' THEN 'NIST RMF'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%TC260%' OR questionText LIKE '%China%' OR questionText LIKE '%Chinese%' THEN 'TC260'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%ethics%' OR questionText LIKE '%Ethics%' OR questionText LIKE '%bias%' OR questionText LIKE '%fairness%' THEN 'Ethics'
    ELSE 'Incident Analysis'
  END as category,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM test_questions
GROUP BY category;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%EU AI Act%' OR questionText LIKE '%high-risk%' OR questionText LIKE '%Article%' THEN 'EU AI Act'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%NIST%' OR questionText LIKE '%risk management framework%' THEN 'NIST RMF'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%TC260%' OR questionText LIKE '%China%' OR questionText LIKE '%Chinese%' THEN 'TC260'
    WHEN questionText LIKE '%ethics%' OR questionText LIKE '%Ethics%' OR questionText LIKE '%bias%' OR questionText LIKE '%fairness%' THEN 'Ethics'
    ELSE 'Incident Analysis'
  END as category,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM test_questions
GROUP BY category;

category	count
TC260	3
